summary: Reluctantly, a dour long-distance truck driver agrees to give a lift to a Paraguayan single mother and her five-month-old daughter to Buenos Aires. Can the palpable silence soften up the taciturn trucker's sullen heart?
cast: Germán de Silva|Hebe Duarte|Nayra Calle Mamani|Matilde Jazmín Mamani|Mónica Sosa|Diego Pasqualleto|Andrés Lezcano|Mimi Leiva|Odón Morán López|Darío Luchetta|Lili López|Yanina López|Nelly Acosta|Quique Acosta|Jazmín Chávez|Raquel Franco|Antolín Gómez|Emma Centurión|Rocio Romero
title: Las acacias
